info.title: Giphy Stickers API
info.description: Giphy is an animated GIF search engine. The Giphy API is open to the public. We have instituted a simple, single public beta key system to let anyone try it out. The API key is required for all endpoints.

get.description: Returns a spotaneously selected sticker from Giphys sticker collection. Optionally limit scope of result to a specific tag. Like the GIF random endpoint, Punctuation will be stripped and ignored. Use a hyphen for phrases. Example oops, birthday or thank-you. Search terms should be URL encoded.n n http://api.giphy.com/v1/stickers/random?api_key=dc6zaTOxFJmzC&tag=oopsnnExample random query.

parameters.name: user-id
parameters.description: The ID of a user, or **self** to retrieve information about authenticated user.

parameters.name: user-id
parameters.description: The ID of a user to get information about, or **self** to retrieve information about authenticated user.

get.description: Replicates the functionality and requirements of the classic Giphy search, but returns animated stickers rather than gifs. Example Catnn http://api.giphy.com/v1/stickers/search?q=cat&api_key=dc6zaTOxFJmzC

Using the same alogirithm as the GIF translate endpoint, the sticker translate endpoint turns words into stickers.nn http://api.giphy.com/v1/stickers/translate?s=hungry&api_key=dc6zaTOxFJmzCnnExample translate query.

Get the latest stickers trending on Giphy with this endpoint. Hand curated by the Giphy editorial team and refreshed daily. nn http://api.giphy.com/v1/stickers/trending?api_key=dc6zaTOxFJmzCnnExample trending query with html formatted response.nnExample trending query with default json response.
